home.text_base_description: 1645 Pacific Ave is an architectural love letter to San Francisco, and Residence 5G is one of its most celebrated lines. 5G is an exceptional north view residence with a signature sweeping terrace that spans the width of its attractive floor plan. The terrace is enveloped in the classically composed design influences of the building, constructed in 2014, which embrace not only the historical hand-crafted aesthetic, but also the tenets of modernism and a true love for the city itself. Desirable floor plan includes two bedrooms, both with en suite bathrooms, nicely separated on either side of the residence and each with access to the expansive view terrace, plus spacious Den/Office. Classic details include crown molding, tall baseboards, hardwood flooring throughout, recessed lighting. 1 Pkg + Storage. 1645 Pacific is a boutique doorman elevator building well-located at the convergence of Russian Hill/Pacific Heights/Nob Hill. Building incl bicycle storage, garage parking, full HVAC.

home_facts.Property_Type: Full, Flat, Mid-Rise (4-8), End Unit, Luxury, Condominium
